text: Way of LifePhilosophyPiecesGuidesContributePhilosophyPiecesGuidesContributeWay of LifeValue4Value is more than a monetization scheme; it’s a lifestyle. It’s amindset of abundance and fairness, a new way of looking at value—value ingeneral, but digital value in particular.It is hard to put a finger on the V4V lifestyle, but one could summarize it asfollows:No expectationsNo entitlementNo bullshitIt is a trust in the universe and its people, a trust that if you produce something of value, people will find it valuable and give back. If you ask them, that is.V4VHomeContributeSomething missing? Found a typo? Open an issue on GitHub.
